languages.text: "Когда нас поймали, я... я мало что помню. Помню, что на меня надели какие-то кандалы, которые жглись при каждом шепотке. Помню уколы, после которых тело каменело. Помню, как меня... уволокли от вас".

"When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember them... dragging me away from you."
languages.original_text: "Когда нас поймали, я... я мало что помню. Помню, что на меня надели какие-то кандалы, которые жглись при каждом шепотке. Помню уколы, после которых тело каменело. Помню, как меня... уволокли от вас".

traits.locale_text: "When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember how they... dragged me away from you."

"When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember how they... dragged me away from you."

"When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember them... dragging me away from you."

languages.text: 「彼らに捕まった時のことは…私は…あまり覚えていないの。囁き声が聞こえるたびに熱くなる手かせと足かせ。体がしびれるような注射は覚えているわ。それからあなたの元から…引きずって連れて行かれるのも」
languages.original_text: "When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember them... dragging me away from you."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らに捕まった時のことは…私は…あまり覚えていないの。囁き声が聞こえるたびに熱くなる手かせと足かせ。体がしびれるような注射は覚えているわ。それからあなたの元から…引きずって連れて行かれるのも」

languages.text: “他们抓住我们的时候，我……我不太记得那个时候发生了什么。我记得那些声音对我低语，那个被烧坏了脸的人被拖走了。我记得他们往我身体里注射了什么，我的身体失去了知觉。我记得……他们把我从你身边拖走了。”
languages.original_text: "When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember them... dragging me away from you."

traits.locale_text: “他们抓住我们的时候，我……我不太记得那个时候发生了什么。我记得那些声音对我低语，那个被烧坏了脸的人被拖走了。我记得他们往我身体里注射了什么，我的身体失去了知觉。我记得……他们把我从你身边拖走了。”

languages.text: «Cuando nos capturaron, no... No recuerdo mucho de ese momento. Había unas cadenas que quemaban cada vez que oía un susurro. Inyecciones que dejaban mi cuerpo inútil. Me... me arrastraron lejos de usted».
languages.original_text: "When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember them... dragging me away from you."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando nos capturaron, no... No recuerdo mucho de ese momento. Había unas cadenas que quemaban cada vez que oía un susurro. Inyecciones que dejaban mi cuerpo inútil. Me... me arrastraron lejos de usted».

languages.text: "Als sie uns verschleppt haben, da ... Ich erinnere mich an kaum etwas. Nur an Fesseln, die gebrannt haben, wann immer ich ein Flüstern gehört habe. An Spritzen, durch die mein Körper taub geworden ist. Daran ... dass sie mich von Euch weggeschleift haben."
languages.original_text: "When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember them... dragging me away from you."

traits.locale_text: "Als sie uns verschleppt haben, da ... Ich erinnere mich an kaum etwas. Nur an Fesseln, die gebrannt haben, wann immer ich ein Flüstern gehört habe. An Spritzen, durch die mein Körper taub geworden ist. Daran ... dass sie mich von Euch weggeschleift haben."

languages.text: « Quand ils nous ont capturés, j'ai... Je ne me souviens pas bien de ce qui s'est passé à ce moment-là. Je me souviens de chaînes qui me brûlaient chaque fois que j'entendais un murmure. Je me souviens d'injections qui m'engourdissaient le corps. Et je me souviens... qu'ils m'ont traînée loin de vous. »
languages.original_text: "When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember them... dragging me away from you."

traits.locale_text: « Quand ils nous ont capturés, j'ai... Je ne me souviens pas bien de ce qui s'est passé à ce moment-là. Je me souviens de chaînes qui me brûlaient chaque fois que j'entendais un murmure. Je me souviens d'injections qui m'engourdissaient le corps. Et je me souviens... qu'ils m'ont traînée loin de vous. »

languages.text: "Bizi ele geçirdiklerinde... O günü pek hatırlamıyorum. Bana her fısıltı duyduğumda beni yakan prangalar vurulmuştu, onu hatırlıyorum. Vücudumu uyuşturan enjeksiyonlar yapıldığını da hatırlıyorum. Hatırlıyorum da... Beni sürükleyerek senden uzaklaştırmışlardı."
languages.original_text: "When they captured us, I... I don't remember much from back then. I remember shackles that burned whenever I heard a whisper. I remember injections that made my body go numb. I remember them... dragging me away from you."

traits.locale_text: "Bizi ele geçirdiklerinde... O günü pek hatırlamıyorum. Bana her fısıltı duyduğumda beni yakan prangalar vurulmuştu, onu hatırlıyorum. Vücudumu uyuşturan enjeksiyonlar yapıldığını da hatırlıyorum. Hatırlıyorum da... Beni sürükleyerek senden uzaklaştırmışlardı."
